a1: PDF Organizer combines three tools in one: merge multiple PDFs, split a PDF into individual pages or custom ranges, and rotate pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees.
a2: Yes, completely free with no registration or file limits. Everything is processed in your browser.
q3: Can I reorder pages before merging?
a3: Yes! In the Merge tab, drag and drop your PDF files to reorder them before merging. You can also see a preview thumbnail of each file.
